title-group.article-title: Persuasion in an Empty Ontology: The Eleatic Synthesis of Philosophy, Poetry, and Rhetoric

ref.mixed-citation: Dr. Dana Elder (Eastern Washington University), Dr. Philip Holt (University of Wyoming), and an anonymous reviewer for Philosophy and Rhetoric for several valuable suggestions.
